players.name: Bob
memory: You: "Alice is dead. This is shocking. We need to figure out who did this. I have no special abilities, so I'll be relying on all of you to share your thoughts and observations."
Charlie: "I am the detective, and I investigated Diana last night. She is the mafioso. We must vote her out today to win."
Diana: "I can't believe Charlie is accusing me out of nowhere! That seems like a desperate move to shift blame. Maybe he's the real mafia."

Diana: "Charlie's claim is suspicious—why reveal so quickly if true? It feels like a bluff. We should vote him out to protect the town."
